update SYS_USER
LOGINNAME = #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWD = #{passwd,jdbcType=CHAR},
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGNO = #{orgno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERSTATUS = #{userstatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
IDTYPE = #{idtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDNO = #{idno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
MOBILENO = #{mobileno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFICENO = #{officeno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOMENO = #{homeno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAXNO = #{faxno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSTCODE = #{postcode,jdbcType=CHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=CHAR},
MODIFYDATE = #{modifydate,jdbcType=CHAR},

LASTLOGINSTATION = #{lastloginstation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERTYPE = #{usertype,jdbcType=CHAR},
CERTIFICATE = #{certificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
